stories.text:
About Ulula Ulula is a certified B-Corp that equips organizations with technology, data and analytics to monitor risks of human rights abuses in order to create more responsible supply chains. Our mandate is to improve working conditions in mining, manufacturing and agribusiness by sourcing and processing accurate and timely insights directly from workers across the globe. We have projects across the globe including India, Peru, South Africa and China with clients ranging from NGOs to government departments to household name brands.

About the Role We are searching for an experienced Lead Software Developer to join our growing team in Toronto. The successful candidate will be: Liaising between the team of developers, QA and the Product Team to build and implement functional programs with best practices. Developing software with clean, efficient code. Mentor and coach team members In this role, you should be a team player with excellent communication skills, a keen eye for detail and problem-solving skills.

What you’ll do: Work closely with senior stakeholders to understand business requirements and help translate these into technical requirements for the development team Work with the development and product teams in the design, development, coding, testing and debugging of applications Write testable, scalable and efficient code based on specifications Conduct code reviews Collaborate with other teams in the development and execution of User Acceptance Tests Integrate software components and third-party programs Verify and deploy programs and systems Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software Gather and evaluate user feedback Recommend and execute improvements Create technical documentation for reference and reporting

Your preferred profile: 8+ years proven experience as a Technical Team Lead and Software Engineer Experience with software design and development in a test-driven environment Solid experience with PHP, Laraval, VueJS Experience with databases and Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) frameworks (e.g. Hibernate) Excellent communication skills Resourcefulness and troubleshooting aptitude Attention to detail BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field

What sets you apart: Proven experience successfully mentoring, coaching and leading Software Development teams.

Company perks and culture: Competitive compensation and employee stock option plan Generous benefits package including dental and eye care Work on a high achieving and driven multi-cultural team in a fast-paced environment Interact with global companies and organizations

If the role sounds like a great fit and you are interested, please send us your CV to info@ulula.com or ihechi@ulula.com
